casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Justin Delane KRAFT 448P18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 21, 2018 Andrew M. Newman, Attorney at Law, for Kraft, Justin Delane. Rory Agan, Associate Attorney General, James R. O'Neill, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 20th of December 2018 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 21st of December 2018."
